biotools.summary: WGT is an open source Wheeler Graph suite for generating, recognizing, and visualizing Wheeler graphs. Central to WGT is "Wheelie", a fast Wheeler graph recognition algorithm that we proposed, which can recognize a graph with 1,000s of nodes in seconds.

bioschemas.name: WGT
bioschemas.summary: WGT is an open source Wheeler Graph suite for generating, recognizing, and visualizing Wheeler graphs. Central to WGT is "Wheelie", a fast Wheeler graph recognition algorithm that we proposed, which can recognize a graph with 1,000s of nodes in seconds.
